translations: n.欧鳊（一种欧洲淡水鱼）；鲷科鱼；太阳鱼（bream 的复数）
vt.（用加热和刮擦的方法）清洁船底（bream 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: Clean and slice the bream, wash and chop preserved mustard green; put the stock into a pot, bring to a boil, add the breams and mustard green to cook, then add salt to taste.
sentences.translation: 鲷鱼片洗净、切片，雪里蕻洗好、切碎，高汤先放锅内，烧开后加入鱼片和雪里蕻同煮，并加盐调味。
